history.proof: intros value H. unfold Consistent. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
M: Model
T: System L

Goal:
forall value : nat -> U M, (forall f : Formula L, mem (Formula L) T f -> interpFormula value (nnTranslate f)) -> Consistent L T

Premises:
System = fun L : Language => Ensemble (Formula L) : Language -> Type
nnTranslate = fun f : Formula L => notH L (notH L (nnHelp f)) : Formula L -> Formula L
Inductive Formula (L : Language) : Set := equal : Term L -> Term L -> Formula L | atomic : forall r : Relations L, Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> Formula L | impH : Formula L -> Formula L -> Formula L | notH : Formula L -> Formula L | forallH : nat -> Formula L -> Formula L Arguments forallH _ _%nat_scope
Consistent : forall L : Language, System L -> Prop
interpFormula = fix interpFormula (value : nat -> U M) (f : Formula L) {struct f} : Prop := match f with | @equal _ t s => interpTerm value t = interpTerm value s | @atomic _ r ts => interpRels (arity L (inl r)) (rel M r) value ts | @impH _ A B => interpFormula value A -> interpFormula value B | @notH _ A => interpFormula value A -> False | @forallH _ v A => forall x : U M, interpFormula (updateValue value v x) A end : (nat -> U M) -> Formula L -> Prop Arguments interpFormula _%function_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
value : forall A : Type, A -> option A
U = fun m : Model => let (U, _, _) := m in U : Model -> Set
mem : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop
preserveValue : forall value : nat -> U M, (forall f : Formula L, mem (Formula L) T f -> interpFormula value (nnTranslate f)) -> forall g : Formula L, SysPrf L T g -> interpFormula value (nnTranslate g)
subInterpFormula2 : forall (value : nat -> U M) (f : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), interpFormula value (substituteFormula L f v s) -> interpFormula (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) f
subInterpFormula1 : forall (value : nat -> U M) (f : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), interpFormula (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) f -> interpFormula value (substituteFormula L f v s)
subInterpFormula : forall (value : nat -> U M) (f : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), interpFormula (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) f < -> interpFormula value (substituteFormula L f v s)
model : forall U : Set, (forall f : Functions L, naryFunc U (arity L (inr f))) -> (forall r : Relations L, naryRel U (arity L (inl r))) -> Model
interpTerm = fix interpTerm (value : nat -> U M) (t : Term L) {struct t} : U M := match t with | @var _ v => value v | @apply _ f ts => interpTerms (arity L (inr f)) (func M f) value ts end with interpTerms (m : nat) (f : naryFunc (U M) m) (value : nat -> U M) (ts : Terms L m) {struct ts} : U M := match ts in (Terms _ n) return (naryFunc (U M) n -> U M) with | @Tnil _ => fun f0 : naryFunc (U M) 0 => f0 | @Tcons _ m0 t ts0 => fun f0 : naryFunc (U M) (S m0) => interpTerms m0 (f0 (interpTerm value t)) value ts0 end f for interpTerm : (nat -> U M) -> Term L -> U M Arguments interpTerm _%function_scope
Formula_depth_ind2 : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula L), (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
Formula_depth_rec2 : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula L), (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall a : Formula L, P a
Formula_depth_rec2rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula L), (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall a : Formula L, (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b a -> P b) -> P a
subInterpTerm : forall (value : nat -> U M) (t : Term L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), interpTerm (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) t = interpTerm value (substituteTerm L t v s)
subInterpRel : forall (value : nat -> U M) (n : nat) (ts : Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : Term L) (r : naryRel (U M) n), interpRels n r (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) ts < -> interpRels n r value (substituteTerms L n ts v s)
freeVarInterpFormula : forall (v1 v2 : nat -> U M) (g : Formula L), (forall x : nat, In x (freeVarFormula L g) -> v1 x = v2 x) -> interpFormula v1 g -> interpFormula v2 g
Formula_depth_rec2_not : forall (L : Language) (Q P : Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : Term L, Q (equal L t t0) -> P (equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (impH L f f0) -> P (impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (impH L f g), f3 f z1 g z3 q = f3 f z2 g z...
Formula_depth_rec2rec_nice : forall (L : Language) (Q P : Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : Term L, Q (equal L t t0) -> P (equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (impH L f f0) -> P (impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (impH L f g), f3 f z1 g z3 q = f3 f z2...
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [L : Language M : Model T : System L |- nat] ?n : [L : Language M : Model T : System L |- nat]
Formula_depth_rec2_forall : forall (L : Language) (Q P : Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : Term L, Q (equal L t t0) -> P (equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (impH L f f0) -> P (impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (impH L f g), f3 f z1 g z3 q = f3 f z2 g...
Formula_depth_rec2_imp : forall (L : Language) (Q P : Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : Term L, Q (equal L t t0) -> P (equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (impH L f f0) -> P (impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (impH L f g), f3 f z1 g z3 q = f3 f z2 g z...
updateValue = fun (value : nat -> U M) (n : nat) (v : U M) (x : nat) => if Nat.eq_dec n x then v else value x : (nat -> U M) -> nat -> U M -> nat -> U M Arguments updateValue _%function_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope
substituteFormulaNotNice : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (z1 z2 : nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}), (forall q : nat * Term L, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall q : nat * Term L, substituteFormulaNot L f z1 q = substituteFormulaNot L f z2 q
substituteFormulaImpNice : forall (L : Language) (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}), (forall q : nat * Term L, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L g}, (forall q : nat * Term L, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : nat * Term L, substituteFormulaImp L f z1 g z3 q = substituteFormulaImp L f z2 g z4 q
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t ?A n), P n (VectorDef.cons ?A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n)), P n v where ?A : [L : Language M : Model T : System L |- Type]
Record Model : Type := model { U : Set; func : forall f : Functions L, naryFunc U (arity L (inr f)); rel : forall r : Relations L, naryRel U (arity L (inl r)) } Arguments model _%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Arguments var _ _%nat_scope Arguments Terms _ _%nat_scope Arguments Tcons _ _%nat_scope
Fin.of_nat_to_nat_inv : forall p : Fin.t ?m, Fin.of_nat_lt (proj2_sig (Fin.to_nat p)) = p where ?m : [L : Language M : Model T : System L |- nat]
Formula_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Type), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
Formula_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> SProp), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
Formula_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
Formula_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
In_freeVarSys : forall L : Language, nat -> System L -> Prop
substituteFormulaImp : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L), (nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}) -> forall g : Formula L, (nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L g}) -> nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L (impH L f g)}
SysPrf : forall L : Language, System L -> Formula L -> Prop
Formula_depth_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Set), (forall a : Formula L, (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b a -> P b) -> P a) -> forall a : Formula L, P a
Formula_depth_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Prop), (forall a : Formula L, (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b a -> P b) -> P a) -> forall a : Formula L, P a
In_freeVarListFormulaE : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (F : Formulas L), In v (freeVarListFormula L F) -> exists f : Formula L, In v (freeVarFormula L f) /\ In f F
Formula_depth_rec_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Set), (forall a : Formula L, (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b a -> P b) -> P a) -> forall (n : nat) (b : Formula L), depth L b <= n -> P b
Formula_depth_rec_indep : forall (L : Language) (Q P : Formula L -> Set) (rec : forall a : Formula L, (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b a -> Q b -> P b) -> Q a -> P a), (forall (a : Formula L) (z1 z2 : forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b a -> Q b -> P b), (forall (b : Formula L) (p : lt_depth L b a) (q : Q b), z1 b p q = z2 b p q) -> forall q : Q a, rec a z1 q = rec a z2 q) -> forall (a : Formula L) (q : Q a), Formula_depth_rec L (fun x : Formula L => Q x -> P x) rec a q = rec a (fun (b : Formula L) (_ : lt_depth L b a) => Formula_depth_rec L (fun x : Formula L => Q x -> P x) rec b) q
In_freeVarListFormula : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (f : Formula L) (F : Formulas L), In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> In f F -> In v (freeVarListFormula L F)
substituteFormulaForallNice : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (a : Formula L) (z1 z2 : forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L b}), (forall (b : Formula L) (q : lt_depth L b (forallH L v a)) (r : nat * Term L), z1 b q r = z2 b q r) -> forall q : nat * Term L, substituteFormulaForall L v a z1 q = substituteFormulaForall L v a z2 q
f_equal_nat : forall (B : Type) (f : nat -> B) (x y : nat), x = y -> f x = f y
Prf_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : forall (f : Formulas L) (f0 : Formula L), Prf L f f0 -> Type), (forall A : Formula L, P (A :: nil) A (AXM L A)) -> (forall (Axm1 Axm2 : Formulas L) (A B : Formula L) (p : Prf L Axm1 (impH L A B)), P Axm1 (impH L A B) p -> forall p0 : Prf L Axm2 A, P Axm2 A p0 -> P (Axm1 ++ Axm2) B (MP L Axm1 Axm2 A B p p0)) ->...-> forall (f13 : Formulas L) (f14 : Formula L) (p : Prf L f13 f14), P f13 f14 p

```coq
intros value H. unfold Consistent. intros f H'. apply H with value. exact H'.
Qed.```

original: intros value H. unfold Consistent. intros f H'. apply H with value. apply H'.
